creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gifts of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky and Mary and Paul Reyelts
description: large human head with a black jar on top of head; face has open eye slits and round holes in earlobes; vessel has tall neck and linear designs; vertical loops at shoulders have long strands of twine/string with ceramic loops of various colors; "belly" has two holes; openings with vertical strands of twine looped around metal pegs; face and shoulders have vertical iridescent lines and dots; white lines near bottom of "body"; areas on body of light tan slip-like material
title: Groundbeing: Resonance
